name: zabbix
description: Zabbix is an enterprise-grade self-hosted monitoring platform for servers, applications, and networks. It collects metrics, sends alerts, and visualizes data on dashboards, with both on-prem and cloud-hosted offerings.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Deploy lightweight agents on servers to collect detailed system metrics and application data

features.title: REST API
features.description: Define and collect custom metrics using scripts, APIs, or database queries for specialized monitoring

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Configure multi-level escalations with email, SMS, and webhook notifications based on trigger conditions

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Create custom dashboards with graphs, maps, and widgets to visualize infrastructure health

features.title: Template Library
features.description: Use pre-built monitoring templates for common applications and devices or create custom templates
